nodes.text: Anson was a male Human Sergeant who could be found on the frozen and barren planet of Hoth during the time period known as the Cold War. On the world, he made his living as a heavy armor vendor and merchant, selling items to the citizens of the Galactic Republic. He wore white armor and carried a blaster pistol.

Anson appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Heavy Armor Vendor for Republic players on Hoth. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Heavy Armor Vendors.
